member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations
member.summary: Operations for managing the RecordSets in a DNS zone.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations.CreateOrUpdateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordType,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordSetCreateOrUpdateParameters,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a RecordSet within a DNS zone.
member.param: The name of the resource group.
The name of the zone without a terminating dot.
The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.
The type of DNS record.
Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: The response to a RecordSet CreateOrUpdate operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations.DeleteAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordType,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordSetDeleteParameters,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes a RecordSet from a DNS zone.
member.param: The name of the resource group.
The name of the zone without a terminating dot.
The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.
The type of DNS record.
The parameters supplied to delete a record set.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations.GetAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordType,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a RecordSet.
member.param: The name of the resource group.
The name of the zone without a terminating dot.
The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.
The type of DNS record.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: The response to a RecordSet Get operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations.ListAsync(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordType,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordSetListParameters,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists the RecordSets of a specified type in a DNS zone.
member.param: The name of the resource group that contains the zone.
The name of the zone from which to enumerate RecordsSets.
The type of record sets to enumerate.
Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: The response to a RecordSet List operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations.ListAllAsync(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.Models.RecordSetListParameters,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists all RecordSets in a DNS zone.
member.param: The name of the resource group that contains the zone.
The name of the zone from which to enumerate RecordSets.
Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: The response to a RecordSet List operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Management.Dns.IRecordSetOperations.ListNextAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists RecordSets in a DNS zone. Depending on the previous call, it will list all types or by type.
member.param: NextLink from the previous successful call to List operation.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: The response to a RecordSet List operation.
